Users Management Module¶

Module that manage the interaction with a models.UserProfile resource

Decorators¶

app_users.decorators.must_be_itself(method_name)¶

Avoid that a user can edit another profile (different from himself)

Forms¶

class app_users.forms.CreativeFieldsAddForm(*args, **kwargs)¶
Manage the creative fields of a user

See also

app_users.models_nn.CreativeFields

class app_users.forms.EmploymentForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.util.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=':', empty_permitted=False, instance=None)¶
Manage the employment data of a user

See also

app_users.models.Employment

class app_users.forms.UserAuthForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.util.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=':', empty_permitted=False, instance=None)¶

Manage the account informations of a user profile

class app_users.forms.UserProfileForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.util.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=':', empty_permitted=False, instance=None)¶

See also

app_users.models.UserProfile

Models¶

class app_users.models.Employment(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for Employment objects, that contains informations about the current employment history of the user

Headline :short description
Industry :industry of specialization
Company :actual employer
Title :position in the company
wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for an Employment object, ie a dictionary containing all the data

class app_users.models.UserProfile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for a UserProfile, one of the main resources

User :django.contrib.auth.models.User
First_name :first name
Last_name :last name
Sex :sex (m,f)
Birthday :birthday
Website :personal website
Phone :telephone number
Country :nationality
Address :address
Availability :availability (Full-Time, Part-Time, Consulting, Freelance, Internship)
Fee :boolean that state if the user is available to work for free
Bio :short biography
Employment :app_users.models.Employment
create_user_profile(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)¶

Create an UserProfile instance when creating a User

delete_connected_accounts()¶

Delete all the connected accounts

delete_connected_data()¶

Delete all connected data

  • connected accounts
  • creative fields
  • employment data
delete_creative_field(field_id)¶

Delete the specified creative field

delete_creative_fields()¶

Delete all the creative fields

delete_employment()¶

Delete the connected employment data

full_name¶

Return the full name of the user (first_name + last_name)

get_connected_accounts()¶

Return a dictionary containing 2 lists

  • one list of connected accounts (provider, url)
  • one list of only names of the actually connected accounts
get_creative_fields()¶

Return the list of all the creative fields of the user

get_employment()¶

Return employment data

get_employment_wrapper()¶

Return wrapper of employment data

get_linkedin_employment()¶

Fetch employment data from LinkedIn

get_linkedin_skills()¶

Fetch skills from LinkedIn

get_profile_pic()¶

Return the URL of the Gravatar profile picture

get_projects_collaborate()¶

Return all the projects in which the user collaborate

get_projects_collaborate_wrapper()¶

Return the wrappers of all the projects in which the user collaborate

get_projects_own()¶

Return all the projects onwned by the user

get_projects_own_wrapper()¶

Return the wrappers of all the projects onwned by the user

get_projects_voted()¶

Return all the projects voted by the user

get_projects_voted_wrapper()¶

Return the wrappers of all the projects voted by the user

get_user_auth_wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for the django.contrib.auth.models.User connected to the UserProfile, avoiding that sensitive informations can be exposed to clients

wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for a UserProfile object, i.e. a dictionary containing all the data

class app_users.models_nn.CreativeFields(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for a many-to-many relationship between users (app_users.models.UserProfile) and CreativeFields

Userprofile :the user of interest
Creative_field :
 creative field associated to the user
get_creative_field()¶

Return a string representation of the creative field

wrapper()¶

Return a wrapper for a CreativeFields object, ie a dictionary containing the wrappers of the involved objects

Views¶

class app_users.views.UserProfileViews¶

View that manage access to the service that handles projects

Supported_formats :
 html, json
Template_path :path to html files
create(request)¶

Create a new user

Rest Types:POST
Url :^(?:$|index.(html|json)$)

Warning

FORBIDDEN

creative_fields_delete(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Delete a creative field

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_itself
Rest Types:POST
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/fields/delete/(?P<field_id>\w+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
creative_fields_manage(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Manage creative fields (add/delete)

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_itself
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/fields(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
destroy(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Destroy a user and all the connected data

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_itself
Rest Types:GET, DELETE
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/destroy(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_itself
Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/edit(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Rest Types:GET
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/employment/linkedin(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Rest Types:GET, POST
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/employment(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/settings/edit(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
show(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Show a app_users.models.UserProfile with all its informations

  • projects owned
  • projects in which collaborate
  • all the data from the connected accounts
Decorators :rest_login_required
Rest Types:GET
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)

Decorators :rest_login_required, must_be_itself
Rest Types:PATCH
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
voted(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Decorators :rest_login_required
Rest Types:GET
Url :^(?P<username>\w+)/voted(?:/$|.(html|json)$)
